languages.text: "Мы будем ждать Вашу Светлость и не покинем орбиту до тех пор, пока вы вновь не займете трон на мостике. Да будут услышаны наши молитвы о вашем скором возвращении".
"We will await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and not leave orbit until you have assumed your throne on the bridge once more. May our prayers for your imminent return be answered."
languages.original_text: "Мы будем ждать Вашу Светлость и не покинем орбиту до тех пор, пока вы вновь не займете трон на мостике. Да будут услышаны наши молитвы о вашем скором возвращении".

traits.locale_text: "We will await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and not leave orbit until you have assumed your throne on the bridge once more. May our prayers for your imminent return be answered."
"We will await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and not leave orbit until you have assumed your throne on the bridge once more. May our prayers for your imminent return be answered."
"We will await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and not leave orbit until you have assumed your throne on the bridge once more. May our prayers for your imminent return be answered."
"We will await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and not leave orbit until you have assumed your throne on the bridge once more. May our prayers for your imminent return be answered."

"We will await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and not leave orbit until you have assumed your throne on the bridge once more. May our prayers for your imminent return be answered."

languages.text: «L{mf|e|a} esperaremos, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No abandonaremos la órbita hasta que haya regresado a su trono en el puente. Que nuestras plegarias por su regreso inminente tengan respuesta».
languages.original_text: "We will await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and not leave orbit until you have assumed your throne on the bridge once more. May our prayers for your imminent return be answered."

traits.locale_text: «L{mf|e|a} esperaremos, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No abandonaremos la órbita hasta que haya regresado a su trono en el puente. Que nuestras plegarias por su regreso inminente tengan respuesta».

languages.text: 「我らは陛下をお待ちし、再びブリッジの王座に就かれるまで軌道を離れはしません。早急な帰還を祈る我らの祈りが届きますように」
languages.original_text: "We will await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and not leave orbit until you have assumed your throne on the bridge once more. May our prayers for your imminent return be answered."

traits.locale_text: 「我らは陛下をお待ちし、再びブリッジの王座に就かれるまで軌道を離れはしません。早急な帰還を祈る我らの祈りが届きますように」

languages.text: “我们会等待您归来，大人。直到您再次坐上舰桥的指挥宝座，我们才会离开这里。我们祈祷您早日归来，希望神皇能回应我们的祈祷。”
languages.original_text: "We will await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and not leave orbit until you have assumed your throne on the bridge once more. May our prayers for your imminent return be answered."

traits.locale_text: “我们会等待您归来，大人。直到您再次坐上舰桥的指挥宝座，我们才会离开这里。我们祈祷您早日归来，希望神皇能回应我们的祈祷。”

languages.text: "Wir warten auf Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} und verlssen den Orbit nicht, bis Ihr wieder auf Eurem Thron auf der Brücke Platz genommen habt. Mögen unsere Gebete um Eure baldige Rückkehr erhört werden."
languages.original_text: "We will await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and not leave orbit until you have assumed your throne on the bridge once more. May our prayers for your imminent return be answered."

traits.locale_text: "Wir warten auf Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} und verlssen den Orbit nicht, bis Ihr wieder auf Eurem Thron auf der Brücke Platz genommen habt. Mögen unsere Gebete um Eure baldige Rückkehr erhört werden."

languages.text: « Nous attendrons Votre Seigneurie et nous ne quitterons pas l'orbite tant que vous n'aurez pas réintégré votre trône sur la passerelle. Puissent nos prières en vue de votre retour prochain être exaucées. »
languages.original_text: "We will await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and not leave orbit until you have assumed your throne on the bridge once more. May our prayers for your imminent return be answered."

traits.locale_text: « Nous attendrons Votre Seigneurie et nous ne quitterons pas l'orbite tant que vous n'aurez pas réintégré votre trône sur la passerelle. Puissent nos prières en vue de votre retour prochain être exaucées. »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni bekleyeceğiz. Köprüdeki tahtınızı yeniden ele geçireceğiniz vakte kadar da yörüngeden ayrılmayacağız. Bir an önce geri dönmeniz için edeceğimiz dualarımız yanıt bulsun."
languages.original_text: "We will await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and not leave orbit until you have assumed your throne on the bridge once more. May our prayers for your imminent return be answered."
